The Japanese midfielder has struggled with a loss of form and injury, but sparked in a convincing display in the 3-1 win over Kilmarnock at Parkhead at the weekend. The team boss [...]

entry.title: ‘I CANNOT MAKE AN EXCUSE,’ HATATE
entry.summary: REO HATATE insists his Man-of-the-Match performance in the 3-1 win over Kilmarnock will act as a turning point as he prepares to prove he can meet the demands of Brendan Rodgers. entry.title: FIFTY-EIGHT YEARS AGO: THE ARRIVAL OF A LISBON LION – COURTESY OF THE No.62 TO AUCHENSHUGGLE
entry.summary: LISBON LION Jim Craig didn’t exactly hit the headlines when he made his first-team debut for Celtic FIFTY-EIGHT years ago. The cultured right-back got the nod from Jock Stein to play in the second leg of the European Cup-Winners’ Cup-tie against Dutch club Go Ahead Deventer on October 7 1965. The Hoops had won the [...]

entry.title: Kris Boyd makes unexpected Celtic admission over Rangers
